hero.title: Welcome to AutoDrive
hero.subtitle: Easily rent your vehicle for business trips, vacations or getaways.

assurance.title: Full Insurance
assurance.desc: Protect your rental with our comprehensive insurance included.

gps.title: Built-in GPS
gps.desc: Navigate easily with our free unlimited GPS.

mission.title: Our mission
mission.desc: Simplify mobility for all our customers
mission.content: AutoDrive is a modern and reliable vehicle rental platform designed to meet the needs of individuals and professionals. Our goal is to make mobility simple, accessible and enjoyable.

why.title: Why choose us?
why.desc: The advantages that make the difference

advantages.item1: Wide range of vehicles suitable for all needs

vision.title: Our vision
vision.content: We believe mobility is a key factor of freedom and development. AutoDrive is committed to offering a smooth, secure and sustainable rental experience, integrating innovative solutions for the future.

form.title: Send us a message
form.desc: Fill in the form below and our team will get back to you promptly.

location.title: Our location üìç
location.desc: Find us easily using the interactive map below.

faq.title: FAQ ‚ùì
faq.intro: Find answers to the most frequently asked questions about our AutoDrive services.

q1.question: How do I book a vehicle?
q1.answer: You can book directly online via our reservation form. Select your dates, choose your vehicle and complete payment in a few clicks.

q2.question: Which payment methods do you accept?
q2.answer: We accept credit cards (Visa, Mastercard) and secure online payments via Stripe.

q3.question: Can I cancel or change my reservation?
q3.answer: Yes, you can cancel or modify your reservation up to 24 hours before the rental start, directly from your customer area.

q4.question: Do you offer utility vehicles?
q4.answer: Of course! AutoDrive provides a full range of utility vehicles suitable for individuals and businesses.

errors.end_after_start: End date must be after start date.

otp.title: OTP verification
otp.description: Enter the code sent to your email to validate your login.
otp.valid_for: The code is valid for 5 minutes.

errors.password_length: Password must be at least 8 characters.

forgot.title: Forgot password
forgot.desc: Enter your email address to receive a reset link.
forgot.hint: We will send a reset link if the email is valid.
